channel.title: Black screen when logging on server
channel.description: My friend and me have a server, have had it for long time, a few months and many people played it, but my friend (hoster) had to remove it from computer...now he has the server again but when he logs from his computer (host), all he sees is a black screen(never happened before) and to other players server appears like offline....help please.

item.title: Black screen when logging on server
item.dc:creator: @facundo facundo
item.description:
@facundo wrote:

My friend and me have a server, have had it for long time, a few months and many people played it, but my friend (hoster) had to remove it from computer…now he has the server again but when he logs from his computer (host), all he sees is a black screen(never happened before) and to other players server appears like offline…help please.
